text: Remember when dry shampoo first became popular? It was like the godsend we didn ’ t know we were waiting for. Finally a product that allowed us to skip showers without having the world know how lazy we are! You could practically hear the scalps of oily - haired girls rejoicing. Unfortunately, we ’ ve taken things a bit far. We ’ re misusing the product, and our hair is paying the price. When I went to visit Nunzio Saviano ‘ s salon for a new cut, he took one look at my hair and asked, “ How often are you using dry shampoo? ” Apparently my dull color and rough texture were telltale signs that I ’ d been hitting the bottle a little too often.
